SqlSequenceInformationOfTable: select  DISTINCT(columnname) AS TargetColumnName , (schemaname +'.' + sequencename) AS Name from BOACard.dbo.tablesequences WHERE schemaname = @schema AND tablename = @tableName
CustomSQLNamesDefinedToProfileSql: SELECT objectid AS Id FROM dbo.objects WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE profileid = @profileId AND objecttype = 'CUSTOMSQL'
CustomSQL_Get_SQL_Item_Info: SELECT text AS Sql, schemaname AS SchemaName, CAST(resultcollectionflag AS INT) AS SqlResultIsCollection FROM dbo.objects WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE profileid = @profileId AND objecttype = 'CUSTOMSQL' AND objectid = @id
SQL_GetProfileIdList: SELECT profileid as ProfileId FROM dbo.profileskt WITH (NOLOCK)

NamingPattern.BoaRepositoryUsingLines: using System;|using System.Data;|using System.Data.SqlClient;|using System.Collections.Generic;|using BOA.Base;|using BOA.Base.Data;|using BOA.Common.Types;|using $(EntityNamespace);|using $(RepositoryNamespace).Shared;
